title: Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Masonic Villages (Elizabethtown, PA) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview is over the phone. There is an additional interview in person if they are interested. The caller was  friendly & personable. They give you all the information you need to make a decision during this call.
Interview Questions: They wanted to know of i had prior experience in the field i was applying for.

title: Environmental Services Interview
Interview Descriptions: Simple process but paper work afterwards took a bit of time. Interview was quick and interviewees were kind. Directions to interview area were clear and staff around to help in event it is needed.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in position

title: Front Desk Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Masonic Villages
Interview Descriptions: the weekends only schedule, was the only thing available when i recently interviewed there. I was really  hoping for a few week days as well as weekends, maybe another time.
Interview Questions: weekdays as well as the weekend rotation

title: IT Helpdesk Technician I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Masonic Villages (Elizabeth, PA) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Applied over the weekend.  Received a call on Monday to setup a phone interview.  Had phone interview on a Tuesday.  Setup in person interview for that Thursday.  12 days after the interview I received a follow up email letting me know that unfortunately I was not selected.  While unfortunate that I did not get the role I was glad they followed up with me.  It left me with a positive opinion of Masonic Villages.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Masonic Villages (Elizabethtown, PA) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: After applying there is a phone interview, then there is a face 2 face interview. Once thats complete it goes to HR Department and if they decide to offer they'll give you a call. It can take 7-10 business days to  back from the HR Department.
Interview Questions: What made you apply for this position here at masonic villages?

title: Server Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Masonic Villages
Interview Descriptions: They will ask about your history and why you left jobs. Most importantly you must smile. They only hire people that smile.  It is also important to have experience with service work. If you have volunteered before. Let them know all about it

title: Hospice Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Masonic Villages in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Professional with a friendly smile, asked a lot of questions and they did offer me the position but I decided that I didn't want the hours they offered. It would conflict with another job I was doing at the time.
Interview Questions: How would me working in this position benefit hospice

title: Director of Gift Planning Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Masonic Villages (Elizabethtown, PA)
Interview Descriptions:
45 minutes in length - 3 person panel 1 didn't show up would have been 4.  1 primary person asking ? The other two were more note takers.
Did not receive offer.
Waited almost three weeks to find out.
Interview Questions: If we have narrowed our search to you and one other why should we select you ?

title: Server Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Masonic Villages (Elizabethtown, PA) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: HR contacted me within a week to set up an initial interview. After the first interview they contacted my references and within another week they called again offering me a position.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and what are some things you would want to improve on?

title: Cafe Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Masonic Villages (Elizabethtown, PA) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: First I had to fill out an application for job position, had a phone interview first, then in person interview that included a short test and meeting face to face with Food service supervisors.
Interview Questions: What made you want to apply for this job?
